name: The islands of the orbs
description:
My submission for Pre-Made Jam 2.

The islands of the orbs is a turn-based roguelike game located in procedural-generated islands. Destroy the orbs  and dodge the enemies to pass to the next island.

Personalize the player:

Controls: 

-Arrows for movement.

-Escape for pause.

Break orb sound by: spookymodem

License
